property.description: Select the parent entity, over the association whose value will be copied into the new image.

property.caption: On Complete Microflow
property.description: The microflow to be called when the upload finishes. Will receive the new object (of the same entity as the current context) as a parameter

property.caption: On Complete Nanoflow
property.description: The nanoflow to be called when the upload finishes. Will receive the new object (of the same entity as the current context) as a parameter

property.caption: Outgoing Entity
property.description: The type of object returned from the widget. If not set, it will be the same type as context. Should be set if Offline is set to true.

property.caption: Outgoing Entity Assocation
property.description: The association between the context object and the object returned from the widget. Should be set if Offline is set to true.

property.description: The size of anchor points used for resizing and rotating the selected item.
